reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater dress classy and well-made, noting it looks good on all shapes and sizes. The dress offers an elegant fit that's not tight or uncomfortable, and customers describe it as comfortable and cozy, particularly for colder months. Moreover, the material is thick and nice, with one customer noting it feels more expensive than expected, while another mentions it's perfect for winter weddings. Additionally, the dress is flattering, hugging the body beautifully, and one customer specifically mentions it works well for a baby bump. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfortable and cute!!
items.body: I got this dress for my baby shower in January and I LOVE it!! I had been searching maternity websites and couldn’t find one I loved so I landed on this. Stretchy, comfy, warm and the light pink color is beautiful. The material does not feel thin and cheap either like some things on Amazon. I never leave reviews but since I was struggling to find the right dress, hopefully I can help someone choose this one. For my pregnant ladies to help with sizing.. I am currently 6 months preg, 5’5”, weigh 150 and ordered a medium and it fits perfect. Very stretchy too so still plenty of room to grow by January. Read more
items.author: Taylor Stoltz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size. Nice quality. Beautiful!!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. True to size. Great quality fabric and color. Warm, soft. I got the dark green and it’s more of an emerald green. Would be so cute with pregnant belly- but probably size up. Feeling like I need a flat stomach day to wear this! I’m shorter (5’4”) , with a long torso, and short legs, so it hit just below mid shin for me. And the slit went up pretty high, in my opinion. Would absolutely purchase again! Read more
items.author: Jenesee

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but Watermelon Red is not the same color as pictured.
items.body: The dress is beautiful. Really good quality. Just the right thickness. Sizing is perfect. But sadly watermelon red is definitely watermelon red and not the color of what is pictured on the site. This is very pink almost like a salmon color. The only reason I will be returning is that this color is too bright pink for the season. Read more
items.author: BostonLJA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great find!
items.body: This is a great Amazon find! The price is great and the quality is good. The material is think, stretchy and comfortable and fits in all the right places! It’s not see through. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Audrey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfy, classy, and so cute!
items.body: Wore this for an evening event and got so many compliments! A few even asked if I was a bride… therefore, if you ARE getting married and looking for shower, luncheon, or other bridal events, this would be perfect. So versatile, comfy, and classy. I wore it tied in the back, but the straps are positioned where you can wear it either way. Warm sweater material, but also looked cute with sleeves cuffed once and pushed up to 3/4 length. Sized accurately and has a nice stretch so that it can fit different body types. Washes well, hung to dry, and looks like new. Read more
items.author: Jamie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning! Love this dress!
items.body: Fits perfectly. Great material. Beautiful Dress. Wrinkle resistant. Read more
items.author: ralph miller

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Dowdy looking
items.body: Ignore all the reviews about this running on the small side; it does not. Go with your regular size. The main issue I had with this dress is with the side slits. Because of the knit fabric, the side slits just gape open when you're standing up. And it does not gape in a pretty way, either. It's rather unflattering and just ugly. I could not stop looking at the ugly gaping. I have other long column dresses with a side slit. Yes, some gaping will happen. But the knit fabric on this just makes the gaping really noticeable and ugly. Read more
items.author: Picky User

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good find!
items.body: I’m 5’5 118lbs, this fit like it was made for me, size small. The front does not show in this picture but it’s flattering all around. Get it! Read more
items.author: Kathryn P

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Maroon, Rust, Blue, Burgundy, Dark Grey, Rose, Black, Camel, Dusty Blue, Dark Green, Red, Almond, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
